comments.text: Firefox gets a code injector called Scratchpad (starting in Firefox 6, if I remember correct) which allows you to run scripts in content or chrome context in the main window (for enabling chrome, you have to toggle devtools.chrome.enabled). This is neat for testing code snippets. Please implement/enable it.
